overview: Miki Imai's first video release, "[passage]". It was released in October 1987 by the LaserDisc Corporation (later known as Pioneer LDC) one month after Imai's second album, "elfin", released. In order to promote the album, a few songs featured in the album are included in this video, which documents Imai's adventures in France as she meets new people, tries new things, and explores new places. The songs from elfin included in the video are: "elfin", "Club Lonely Hearts Exotica", "Pole Position", and "Omoidashita Dake". It also includes a lot of energetic instrumental tracks that are not included anywhere else.
title: Miki Imai [passage]
